comment: And I wanted to buy one tomorrow? Ah never mind : iPhone owners claim it's bending in their pockets
amr:
# ::snt And I wanted to buy one tomorrow? Ah never mind : iPhone owners claim it's bending in their pockets
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op2 (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (b / buy-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (o / one)
                        :time (t / tomorrow))
                  :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)))
      :snt2 (m2 / mind-15
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :time (e / ever)
            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / claim-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (o2 / own-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / phone
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "iPhone"))))
                        :ARG1 (b2 / bend-01
                              :ARG1 p2
                              :location (p3 / pocket
                                    :poss p))))))

comment: Is your iPhone Plus bending in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me? - everyone
amr:
# ::snt Is your iPhone Plus bending in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me? - everyone
(a / amr-choice
      :op1 (b / bend-01
            :ARG0 (p / product
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "iPhone"
                        :op2 "Plus"))
            :location (p2 / pocket
                  :poss (y / you)))
      :op2 (h / happy-01
            :ARG0 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (ii / i))
            :ARG1 y
            :mod (j / just))
      :ARG1-of (s2 / say-01
            :ARG2 (e / everyone)))
